message.body:
(this is strange to send via text.. but since i sent the offhand text earlier i thought i should follow up.. this message is also waiting for you in your email) Michal, Yoshiko just told me about your mother’s passing. I am so sorry. Please let me know how I can be there for you, when you are sitting Shiva (if at all), and if you need anything. I live down the street. You always have a place with me. I know we haven’t known each other for very long, but our friendship has meant so much to me.
Love, Sofie
Omg first thank you you are so sweet second my mother has not passed but she had a sever stroke.
It happened Tuesday morning. VERY scary. Sitting next to her hold on ill walk out to the hall.
i think your phone died. please feel free to call me back anytime.
